data.title: Harald I 'Bluetooth' Gormsson King of DENMARK
data.text:
Father: Gorm 'The Old' Geva Knudsson King of DENMARK

Mother: Thrya Or Thyre Danebod Queen of DENMARK

Birth: Bet 910 and 911, Denmark

Also known as: Harald Blaatand King of Denmark

Also known as: Harold (Herbastus) King of Denmark

Aka (Facts Pg): Harold III Blaatand; Herbastus De Crepon

Fact: Converted to Christianity during his reign

Death: Bet 1 Nov 985 and 986

Burial: Roeskilde Cathedral, Denmark

Partnership with: Gyrithe Or Cyrid Olafsdotter Queen of Sweden & DENMARK

Marriage: (Date and Place unknown)

Child: Seinfreda DE CREPON

Child: Herefast DE CREPON

Child: Gunhild Haraldsdatter Princess of DENMARK Birth: Abt 949, Denmark

Child: Thyra Haraldsdatter Queen of NORWAY Birth: Abt 947, Denmark

Child: Gonnor Or Gunnora of Arques DE CREPON Birth: Bet 936 and 955, Normandy, France

Partnership with: Gunnhild Queen of DENMARK

Marriage: (Date and Place unknown)

Child: Erik Hring King in NORTHUMBRIA

Child: Tyra of DENMARK

Child: Sweyn I King of Denmark Norway ENGLAND Birth: Bet 960 and 965, Denmark

Ancestors of Harald I 'Bluetooth' Gormsson King of DENMARK
